thankyou_screens.title: Thanks for completing the intake form. Next, we'll schedule your appointment.
All done! Thanks for your time.

fields.title: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, please call 911 or seek immediate medical attention.

properties.description:
Signs of an emergency may include:

• Active suicidal/homicidal feelings

• Chest pain or heart attack symptoms 

• Significant difficulty breathing

• Stroke symptoms (facial drooping, arm weakness, speech difficulty)

• Severe allergic reaction

• Fever greater than 104.5°F

• Coughing or vomiting blood

• Sudden, severe, uncontrolled pain

• Severe headache

• Loss of consciousness/changes in mental status

• Poisoning/inhalation of substances

• Moderate to severe wounds/burns

• Seizures

• Significant trauma/head injury

• Pregnancy complications (vaginal bleeding, cramping, or abdominal pain)

fields.title: Are you currently enrolled in Medicaid?

properties.description: Some Nice services are limited for Medicaid recipients.

fields.title: Nice services are limited for Medicaid recipients.

properties.description:
Prescriptions, as well as some lab and imaging services, are not available from Nice if you are currently enrolled in Medicaid.

For more information contact Customer Support via chat.

properties.description: Select the type of care that best fits your needs for this visit.

choices.label: Acute Care: Treat recent symptoms like a cough, sore throat, rash, etc.
Chronic Care: Support for long term health issues like diabetes, high blood pressure, thyroid problems, etc.
Preventive Care: Annual wellness exams, birth control management, etc.

fields.title: Next, we’ll ask some questions about your mental health

properties.description:
Mental health screenings are an important part of a wellness exam. The following questionnaires, called PHQ9 and GAD7, were designed by mental health experts to identify issues like anxiety and depression.

As you answer, think about the last 2 weeks. How often have you been bothered by the following problems?

fields.title: Mental Health
Which of the following best describes the reason you’re seeking mental health care?

properties.description: Select all that apply

fields.title: Please describe the other mental health issue you’d like to discuss.

properties.description: In a few words, describe your high-level issue or concern.

fields.title: Mental health care at Nice is limited for patients under 18.

properties.description:
Mental health therapy at Nice is not available to patients under 18. For these patients, our primary care clinicians can:

• Screen for common mental health conditions like anxiety and depression.

• Recommend next steps for care.

• Connect patients and families with external resources and provide referrals to specialists when needed.

fields.title: The following questionnaires, called PHQ9 and GAD7, were designed by mental health experts to assess symptoms of depression and anxiety.

properties.description: As you answer, think about the last 2 weeks. How often have you been bothered by the following problems?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Little interest or pleasure in doing things

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Trouble sleeping or sleeping too much

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Feeling tired or having little energy

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Poor appetite or overeating

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Feeling bad about yourself — or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed, or the opposite — being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [PHQ9] Thoughts that you would be better off dead, or of hurting yourself

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Not being able to stop or control worrying

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Worrying too much about different things

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Trouble relaxing

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Being so restless that it's hard to sit still

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Becoming easily annoyed or irritable

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?

fields.title: [GAD7] Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

properties.description: In the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by this problem?
